Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Groomsman \Grooms"man\, n.; pl. {Groomsmen}. A male attendant of a bridegroom at his wedding; -- the chief attendant is also called the {best man}; -- the correlative of {bridesmaid}. [1913 Webster]
groomsman n : a male attendant of the bridegroom at a wedding
